title: Rebuild chat feature with AI capabilities

requirements.text: Restore the chat functionality with AI-powered responses that can handle greetings, math questions, science topics, and other educational queries using the existing useChatSessions hook pattern
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create new chat sessions
Users can send messages and receive AI-generated responses
Session list displays all conversations with timestamps

requirements.text: Ensure the ChatPage component correctly integrates ChatSidebar and ChatView with session management and navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar displays list of chat sessions
Clicking a session loads its conversation history
New chat button creates a fresh session
Sidebar is collapsible on mobile viewports

requirements.text: Verify the chat route (/chat) is properly configured in the TanStack Router setup and accessible from the main navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Chat route navigates to the ChatPage component
Chat card on HomePage links to /chat
URL routing works correctly for chat sessions

requirements.text: Fix any deployment issues that caused the previous version 46 build to fail, ensuring successful compilation and network deployment
acceptanceCriteria: Application is accessible via canister URL
No runtime errors in browser console

constraints: Maintain existing localStorage-based chat session storage pattern
Preserve the existing useChatSessions hook implementation for AI response generation
Keep the current UI component structure with ChatSidebar and ChatView
Do not modify immutable paths: useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, or ui components
nonGoals: Adding new AI capabilities beyond what exists in useChatSessions
Changing the chat UI design or layout
Implementing backend persistence for chat messages
Adding real-time chat features or WebSocket connections
